meanings.sent1: She looked uneagerly at the pile of homework on her desk.
meanings.sent2: The students were uneagerly waiting for the bell to ring.
meanings.sent3: He uneagerly agreed to help his friend move, knowing it would take all day.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden bloomed uneagerly after a long winter.
meanings.sent5: The dog wagged its tail uneagerly when offered a bland treat.

meanings.definition: In a reluctant or unwilling manner.
meanings.sent1: She uneagerly agreed to go to the party with her sister.
meanings.sent2: He uneagerly completed the tedious task assigned to him.
meanings.sent3: The cat uneagerly chased after the laser pointer, knowing it was a futile game.
meanings.sent4: The old car uneagerly sputtered to life after sitting in the garage for months.
meanings.sent5: The child uneagerly trudged to school on a rainy Monday morning.
